text.section: After December 31, 2011, a forensic laboratory shall hold a license issued by the Secretary before the forensic laboratory may offer or perform forensic analysis in the State.

The Secretary shall issue a letter of exception to a laboratory that:
Performs only limited forensic analysis; and
Meets the exception requirements in regulations adopted by the Secretary.
The Secretary may grant an out-of-state forensic laboratory a waiver from the licensure requirements of this subtitle with conditions.
